name: Luigi's Hammer Toss Game
summary: Luigi's Hammer Toss Game is a Game Watch released by Nintendo in 1990. The game has you play as Mario's brother Luigi where you earn points by moving Luigi left and right to deflect the Hammers thrown by two cloud-riding Hammer Bros. with his shield. Since Mario is Missing! was released in 1992, Luigi's Hammer Toss Game is technically Luigi's first solo game.
